name: battlecode-playback
description: Play back and analyze battlecode match files.
author: Teh Devs

scripts.test: echo running server tests... && cd test && ts-node ../node_modules/blue-tape/bin/blue-tape.js "**/*.ts" | tap-dot
scripts.publish: npm -s run lint+build+test && echo please publish to typings/registry
scripts.build+test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.lint+build+test: npm run lint && npm run build+test
